statements: SELECT * FROM loan_approval_processes;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name FROM loan_approval_processes ORDER BY loan_id DESC;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, approval_status FROM loan_approval_processes WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, credit_score FROM loan_approval_processes WHERE approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT MAX(loan_amount) AS max_loan_amount FROM loan_approval_processes;
SELECT * FROM loan_approval_processes WHERE applicant_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_approval_processes WHERE loan_amount >= 10000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, credit_score, approval_status FROM loan_approval_processes WHERE credit_score > 700 AND approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT loan_id, approval_status FROM loan_approval_processes WHERE loan_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000','223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001');
SELECT * FROM loan_approval_processes WHERE loan_amount < 5000 OR approval_status = 'Rejected' ORDER BY loan_amount ASC, applicant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_age FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT * FROM ApprovalCriteria WHERE minimum_score < 600 AND maximum_loan_amount >= 10000 ORDER BY criteria_name ASC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, credit_score FROM LoanApplications WHERE applicant_age >= 25 AND credit_score < 600 AND loan_amount > 20000;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE applicant_age > 30 AND credit_score >= 700;
SELECT DISTINCT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_age, credit_score FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE applicant_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND loan_amount < 5000;
SELECT criteria_name, minimum_score, maximum_loan_amount FROM ApprovalCriteria ORDER BY minimum_score ASC;
SELECT id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications
SELECT * FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY score_date DESC
SELECT applicant_name, approval_status FROM loan_applications WHERE approval_status = TRUE
SELECT id, criteria_name FROM approval_criteria WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount, approval_status FROM loan_applications WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM loan_applications INNER JOIN credit_scores ON loan_applications.id = credit_scores.applicant_id WHERE credit_score < 600 AND approval_status = true
SELECT applicant_name, approval_status FROM loan_applications WHERE approval_status = false AND loan_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000
SELECT AVG(credit_score) AS average_score FROM credit_scores
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE applicant_email LIKE '%@gmail.com' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM loan_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT rule_name, min_credit_score FROM criteria_rules WHERE max_loan_amount < 10000;
SELECT * FROM loan_approvals JOIN criteria_rules ON loan_approvals.rule_id = criteria_rules.rule_id;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY applicant_name DESC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE credit_score > 700 AND loan_amount < 10000;

SELECT loan_approvals.approval_id, loan_approvals.approval_date, loan_applications.applicant_name FROM loan_approvals JOIN loan_applications ON loan_approvals.application_id = loan_applications.application_id WHERE loan_approvals.rule_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT credit_score, applicant_name, score_date FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800 ORDER BY score_date ASC;

SELECT criteria_rules.rule_name, criteria_rules.min_credit_score, loan_applications.applicant_name, loan_applications.loan_amount FROM criteria_rules JOIN loan_applications ON criteria_rules.min_credit_score < loan_applications.credit_score AND criteria_rules.max_loan_amount > loan_applications.loan_amount;
SELECT * FROM loans;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_status='approved';
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT approver_name, department FROM approvers WHERE approval_limit > 5000;
SELECT loan_id, approval_date, approved_amount FROM approvals ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'approved';
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT approval_id, approval_date FROM approvals ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT approver_name, department FROM approvers WHERE approval_limit < 10000;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, approval_date FROM loans INNER JOIN approvals ON loans.loan_id = approvals.loan_id WHERE approvals.approved_amount > 5000 ORDER BY approval_date ASC;
